channel.title: 508 Tokkulscape help?
channel.description: Okay, i'm using clockwise27's tokkulscape (found here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=391563.0) and i needed a little help with tweaking a few problems i've seen. The PK is a good system, but when a death occures, a small handful of random items are dropped. I would like to change it so that everything except for the 3 items are dropped. Also, staff can't trade players, and i would like to fix that as well. Any help that can be given would be greatly appreciated, if possible, use as much detail as you can, i'm fairly new to this.

item.title: 508 Tokkulscape help?
item.dc:creator: @krazemonke krazemonke
item.description:
@krazemonke wrote:

Okay, i’m using clockwise27’s tokkulscape (found here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=391563.0) and i needed a little help with tweaking a few problems i’ve seen. The PK is a good system, but when a death occures, a small handful of random items are dropped. I would like to change it so that everything except for the 3 items are dropped. Also, staff can’t trade players, and i would like to fix that as well. Any help that can be given would be greatly appreciated, if possible, use as much detail as you can, i’m fairly new to this.

Read full topic
